DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SA4503 in patients recovering from a recent stroke. Secondary, to evaluate the efficacy of SA4503 compared to placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Preliminary Efficacy Study of SA4503 in Subjects Recovering From Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Further study details as provided by M's Science Corporation:
DOC.criteria: Key Males or females 18 years of age or older Experienced a stroke from 48 to 72 hours before randomization A total score of >/=4 on the NIHSS, or >/=2 on the upper or lower extremity motor scores of the NIHSS Medically and neurologically stable within 24 hours prior to randomization Key Patients with transient ischemic attack Patients with stroke in progression Unstable cardiac, hepatic, or renal disease, or other major medical disorder
